title: Film Cover Type ID, Abbas Kiarostami's Ten
content:
Any ideas? (the typeface used to write “abbas kiarostami’s ten”) WhatTheFont didn’t quite nail it.  
Great movie, by the by.  
Thanks very much!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109063254im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Tenposter_01_4379.gif)

 [‹ Formata???](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109063254/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33837 "Go to previous forum topic") [C3 logo. Sans serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071109063254/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33825 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sven s

comments.content:
On first glance, it looks like Berthold City.

- Lex

That’s it, thank you!  
This board needs a way to send people pints or something in gratitude.
